title: The 'Father' Of G.I. Joe Vowed To Honor The Military
teaser: Donald Levine, an executive at Hasbro, served in the Army in Korea and thought G.I. Joe would be a way to honor veterans. (This story originally aired on All Things Considered on May 26.)
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
